body:
I guess my journey here is coming to an abrupt end. Didn't really see this coming.

Playing competitively and being in Apollo was the main reason why I stayed playing the server. After making some mistakes that I can no longer fix and possibly losing a few friends, I'm out of Apollo and it doesn't seem that I'm able to join back.

Refereeing is no longer fun anymore, and now that I have no other reason to stay playing, I've decided to leave. Maybe I'll be that guy who comes back in a month or two who knows, but this is it for now.

Thanks for a long 3 years, it was filled with fun and joy and I've met great people that I won't forget. I'll probably be still on the forums because of habit, but in terms of server activity not much. Maybe on alts.

If you want to contact me, there's still skype and discord, I'll be on.

But for now, cya
